import React, {useState} from 'react' import {} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Edit = () => { const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(product) axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/api/create/product`, { Title: product.title, Price: product.price, Desc: product.desc }) .then(res => console.log(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const handleChange = (e) =>{ setProduct({...product, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Product Manager

) } export default Edit
